title: What to Do on Your Honeymoon in Key West
post_content:
What to Do on Your Honeymoon in Key West

After months of preparation and planning, your dream wedding has come and gone. You’ve finally tied the knot. Now, find where happily ever after really begins on your honeymoon in Key West. An escape to paradise in every way, Key West offers endless things to do on your honeymoon, from exciting adventures to unique local experiences. Curate your honeymoon getaway with some of our top picks in Key West.

Stock Island Art Tour

Get to know charming Stock Island on a tour of the local art scene. Whether you’re just looking or want to start your own personal art collection, Stock Island offers locally-crafted pieces suited to a range of tastes and prices. Some of our favorite art hubs on Stock Island include Koz’s Green World Gallery, Washed Up Key West, Collections Key West, and Stock Island Studios.

Beach Day at Fort Zachary Taylor

Found on the southern end of Key West, Fort Zachary Taylor Historic State Park is widely considered by locals to be  the best beach in Key West. Here, you can unwind on the white sand with your favorite book or take to the water and explore below the surface on a snorkeling adventure.

Dinner at Yellowfin

Cheers to your new life together at our waterfront restaurant, Yellowfin Bar & Grill. Enjoy classic flavors of the Florida Keys with expertly-crafted cuisine, including dishes such as blackened grouper and guava ribs. Save on your romantic dinner when you reserve your stay at our Stock Island resort using our Suite Escapes package.

Dessert at Blue Heaven

Indulge in something sweet during your stay in Key West. Famous for their desserts, Blue Heaven is an unmissable culinary destination. Their key lime pie is the best in Florida, made with fresh lime juice, towering meringue, and a delectable graham-cracker crust.

Sunset Cruise

End your honeymoon in Key West on a high note with a stunning sunset cruise. Sail around the pristine waters and watch the sky light up with vibrant sunset shades as you toast to an unforgettable honeymoon getaway. We’ve partnered with local boat charters to make planning your cruise around Key West a breeze.
